headline.main: News Q’s | With Halo 5, Microsoft Seeks to Lure E-Sports Players Back

docs.snippet: Microsoft is offering $1 million in prize money to competitive gamers, a crucial leg in the multimillion-dollar marketing push for the video game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Microsoft is offering $1 million in prize money to competitive gamers, a crucial leg in the multimillion-dollar marketing push for the video game.
docs.abstract: Microsoft team responsible for development of Halo 5: Guardians is focusing on making game appealing to elite gamers in order to secure place in fast-growing and lucrative world of competitive video games, or e-sports; game is latest in blockbuster series; company announces that its Halo competition will have total of $1 million in prize money.

headline.main: With Halo 5: Guardians, Microsoft Seeks to Lure E-Sports Players Back

docs.snippet: After Chris Davis was called out on strikes on a full-count earlier in the game, the last thing the Baltimore Orioles first baseman was going to do on a 3-2 pitch with the bases loaded in the 10th inning on Wednesday was go down looking....
docs.lead_paragraph: After Chris Davis was called out on strikes on a full-count earlier in the game, the last thing the Baltimore Orioles first baseman was going to do on a 3-2 pitch with the bases loaded in the 10th inning on Wednesday was go down looking.

headline.main: Davis' 10th-Inning Slam Leads Orioles Past A's
headline.print_headline: Davis' 10th-Inning Slam Leads Orioles Past A's

docs.snippet: A new review of research helpfully concludes that there is a reliable, scientifically valid way for each of us to pick the right running shoes, but it’s so simple that most of us ignore it....

docs.snippet: Mississippi Republican Gov. Phil Bryant has $2.8 million in his campaign fund, and his Democratic challenger in the November election is a truck driver who reported spending no money so far and who said he didn't even vote in Tuesday's primary....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mississippi Republican Gov. Phil Bryant has $2.8 million in his campaign fund, and his Democratic challenger in the November election is a truck driver who reported spending no money so far and who said he didn't even vote in Tuesday's primary.

headline.main: Truck Driver Wins Dem Nomination for Mississippi Governor
headline.print_headline: Truck Driver Wins Dem Nomination for Mississippi Governor

docs.snippet: In a move that reflects a shifting media landscape, Swindon Town F.C. has largely barred reporters from interviewing players and coaches, and it plans to provide its own content....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a move that reflects a shifting media landscape, Swindon Town F.C. has largely barred reporters from interviewing players and coaches, and it plans to provide its own content.
docs.abstract: English soccer team Swindon Town FC goes to unusual lengths to control and tailor its coverage in media; began strictly limiting access for reporters, photographers and videographers when owner became displeased with local newspaper's coverage of legal battle for team's ownership; some American professional and college teams have taken steps to control their portrayal in media but Swindon's move is notable because it is a third-division club with a small following.

headline.main: English Club Shuts Out Journalists With New Kind of Defense
headline.print_headline: Shutting Out Journalists With a New Kind of Defense
